songs.title: Don’t Wanna Dance Alone (Cole Plante Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse: Lauren]
Calling all my girls
There's an SOS tonight, let's have some fun, yeah
One hundred percent
Every single trace of my weekdays are gone, yeah

[Pre-Chorus: Normani]
There's gonna be a million faces up in this room, room
But the only one who gets my attention is you, you

[Chorus: Lauren and Camila & (All)]
I got my best (best) on, and I feel like dancing all night (night) long
Nothing's gonna stop me, you're what I (I, I) want
So baby come and get me 'cause I don't wanna dance alone
Oh, it's been so long, thinking 'bout the feeling of your (your) arms
Wrapped around my body, that's what I (I, I) want (want)
So baby come and get me 'cause I don't wanna dance alone

[Verse: Camila]
Out on the floor
I can feel you staring at me across the room, oh
Whatcha waiting for?
All I want is you so come and make your move, ow

[Pre-Chorus: Dinah]
I see a million silhouettes dancing in this room, room
I wanna be the one who gets the attention from you

[Chorus: Lauren and Camila & (All)]
I got my best (best) on, and I feel like dancing all night (night) long
Nothing's gonna stop me, you're what I (I, I) want
So baby come and get me 'cause I don't wanna dance alone

[Bridge: Ally]
If you come in close, then I won't say no
Baby all I want is you
If you move too slow, then you'll never know
All the things that we could do
If you come in close, then I won't say no
Baby all I want is you
If you move too slow, then you'll never know
All the things that we could do

[Chorus: Lauren and Camila & (Camila) & (All)]
(I got my best on!)
I got my best (best) on, and I feel like dancing all night (night) long (all night long)
Nothing's gonna stop me, you're what I (I, I) want (you're what I want)
So baby come and get me 'cause I don't wanna dance alone
Oh, it's been so (so) long (long), thinking 'bout the feeling of your (your) arms (your arms)
Wrapped around my body, that's what I (I, I) want (want)
So baby come and get me 'cause I don't wanna dance alone

[End: Camila]
Don't let me dance alone
I don't wanna dance alone
I don't wanna dance alone
